WorkItem.Description:
Hi!
since my attempt to distribute the new Microsoft Fix it 51001 for CVE-2013-3893 failed because the clients didn't "realize" after the installation, that the fix already has been installed (though they should have via the MSI product code), I considered using the latest version of Package Publisher (I am using 1.2.1306.16).
I tried it in a test environment with the result that the updates and information about the updates in the  package publisher won't appear in the new version, though I'm connecting to the same WSUS.
Any ideas how I can use new versions withour loosing these information?
WorkItem.Summary: Upgrade to new version of WPP without loosing updates

Comments.Message:
Take a look under Settings/Updates if the Checkbox "Show locally published updates..." is checked. You have to restart WPP after activating that.

Regards
Norbert
Oh, I didn't realize that, sorry, thank you very much for your help!
